name: 7. AI TOOLS PROCESSOR: Trigger from AI Tools -> Create Summary -> Put GoogleSheet

interface.label: Create One Sentence Summary For the AI Tools/Updates (E)

messages.content: You are a helpful intelligent researching assistant.

Your task is to research this link: {{3.`2`}} on the internet and create a Title and 1-sentence overview of it. Also get the publication date.

The overview should only be 1 sentence.

==============

The final output should be like this:

TITLE: "title of the AI tool or update here"
OVERVIEW: "put the 1-sentence overview here"
PUBLICATION DATE: "put the publication date here"

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.name: content

nested.help:
Make sure to use a publicly accessible URL.
You can test if your image is publicly accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.
